title: The Breaking Point: A Story of Betrayal
description: John Moore had it all, but he could not stop. He had power, money, influence, respect, and sex. But still, it was not enough. He had to have MORE. The more he saw, the more he wanted, until he met the right ONE - or so he thought.  Wealthy International Interior Designer Amanda Moore, traded in a prominent career for a fairy tale life - or so she thought. This Hollywood fairy tale marriage quickly became a hellish nightmare, trapping each of them in a web full of lies, broken promises, secret rendezvous, betrayal and finally death. As this web spins out of control, lives are left hanging in the balance, until they reach The Breaking Point.
author: Bella Jai Frances
